thread.title: BRIEF-Edwards Lifesciences Enters Into Accelerated Share Repurchase Agreement

title: BRIEF-Edwards Lifesciences Enters Into Accelerated Share Repurchase Agreement
text:
May 1, 2018 / 12:26 PM / Updated 7 minutes ago BRIEF-Edwards Lifesciences Enters Into Accelerated Share Repurchase Agreement Reuters Staff
May 1 (Reuters) - Edwards Lifesciences Corp:
* EDWARDS LIFESCIENCES ENTERS INTO ACCELERATED SHARE REPURCHASE AGREEMENT
* EDWARDS LIFESCIENCES CORP - WILL RECEIVE APPROXIMATELY 2.5 MILLION SHARES IN MAY 2018
* EDWARDS LIFESCIENCES CORP - ACCELERATED SHARE REPURCHASE (ASR) AGREEMENT TO REPURCHASE AN AGGREGATE OF $400 MILLION OF EDWARDS’ COMMON STOCK
* EDWARDS LIFESCIENCES CORP - ENTERED INTO AN ACCELERATED SHARE REPURCHASE AGREEMENT TO REPURCHASE $400 MILLION OF EDWARDS’ COMMON STOCK. Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
